resources.string: About Easy math \nEasy Math is inspired by Digidots, a way to teach basic addition,subtraction,multiplication and division skills. Students learn the position of dots and lines (forming an \'X\') on each digit. The number of marks on each digit corresponds to the value of the digit.For example to add two digits together, students count the marks on each digit to find the sum. In \'Learn\' mode, students learn the placement of the dots and lines on the digits. In \'Practice\' mode, students have to remember where the dots and lines are located. In \'Addition Quiz\' mode for example, student get to apply what they have learned to answer ten addition problems.
